h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ ^a^T5.0001^ea^ ^a^M4.0195^ea^ ^a^V4.0229^ea^ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte nava, āsevane nava, kamme nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte nava, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava (anulomaṃ).

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati nādhipatipaccayā. hetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati nādhipatipaccayā. hetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti nādhipatipaccayā. (3)

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ nādhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, nāasevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava (paccanīyaṃ).

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ nahetu abyākato dhammo nahetussa abyākatassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo... jhānapaccayena paccayo... maggapaccayena paccayo... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo.

[01] nahetu ^a^V4.0243^ea^ abyākato dhammo nahetussa abyākatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] hetu abyākato ca nahetu abyākato ca dhammā nahetussa abyākatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1) (saṃkhittaṃ.)

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ hetu ^a^T5.0015^ea^ abyākato dhammo hetussa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. hetu abyākato dhammo nahetussa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. hetu abyākato dhammo hetussa abyākatassa ca nahetussa abyākatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ nahetu abyākato dhammo nahetussa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejātapaccayena paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo... āhārapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo.
[03] 66^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā nava, nāarammaṇe nava, nādhipatiyā nava (saṃkhittaṃ, paccanīyaṃ).
[01] hetupaccayā ^a^M4.0208^ea^ nāarammaṇe tīṇi (saṃkhittaṃ, anulomapaccanīyaṃ).
[03] nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava (saṃkhittaṃ, paccanīyānulomaṃ).
[03] (yathā ^a^V4.0244^ea^ kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
[06] hetudukakusalattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ ^a^T5.0016^ea^ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nahetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nahetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ ^a^V4.0245^ea^ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca nahetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca nahetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca ^a^M4.0209^ea^ nahetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca ^a^T5.0017^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3) (saṃkhittaṃ.)

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte nava, āsevane nava, kamme nava, vipāke nava, āhāre nava...pe0... avigate nava (anulomaṃ).
[03] 71^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (1)

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nādhipatipaccayā. hetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nādhipatipaccayā (saṃkhittaṃ).
[03] 73^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā ekaṃ, nādhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, nāasevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte nava (paccanīyaṃ).
[01] hetupaccayā nādhipatiyā nava (saṃkhittaṃ, anulomapaccanīyaṃ).
[03] nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ, paccanīyānulomaṃ).
[03] (sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
[03] 74^b^.^eb^ hetu ^a^T5.0018^ea^ ^a^V4.0246^ea^ sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo hetussa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] 75^b^.^eb^ hetu ^a^M4.0210^ea^ sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo hetussa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nahetussa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā hetussa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] 76^b^.^eb^ hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo hetussa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati... tīṇi.
[03] nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nahetussa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati... tīṇi.
[03] hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā hetussa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati... tīṇi...pe0....

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ hetu ^a^V4.0247^ea^ sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo hetussa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇūpanissayo ^a^T5.0019^ea^, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo... nava (saṃkhittaṃ).

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nahetussa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo hetussa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo hetussa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca nahetussa ^a^M4.0211^ea^ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[06] ...vipākapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nahetussa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi...pe0.... hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo hetussa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa avigatapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo hetussa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ).
[03] 82^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā ^a^T5.0020^ea^ ^a^V4.0248^ea^ nava, nāarammaṇe nava...pe0... noavigate nava (paccanīyaṃ).
[01] hetupaccayā nāarammaṇe tīṇi (saṃkhittaṃ, anulomapaccanīyaṃ).
[01] nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava (saṃkhittaṃ, paccanīyānulomaṃ).
[03] (yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuṃ dukkhāya vedanāya ^a^M4.0212^ea^ sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nahetu dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
[03] nahetuṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nādhipatipaccayā (saṃkhittaṃ).

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ hetu ^a^M4.0213^ea^ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo hetussa dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. hetu dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nahetussa dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. hetu dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo ^a^T5.0022^ea^ hetussa ^a^V4.0250^ea^ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca nahetussa dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 89^b^.^eb^ hetu dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo hetussa dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] nahetu dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nahetussa dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.

[03] 108^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuṃ ^a^V4.0255^ea^ vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuṃ vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu vipāko ca nahetu vipāko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ hetuyā ^a^M4.0228^ea^ tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate ^a^T5.0039^ea^ nava, avigate nava.
[03] 162^b^.^eb^ hetu upādinnupādāniyo dhammo hetussa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.

[03] nahetu upādinnupādāniyo dhammo nahetussa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejātapaccayena paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo... āhārapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ).

[03] nahetuṃ anupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati nāarammaṇapaccayā. (1)

[03] nahetu anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo nahetussa anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati... nava...pe0....

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (ekaṃ). savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (dve). savitakkasavicāraṃ ^a^M4.0494^ea^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkāvicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (tīṇi). savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā (cattāri). savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca ^a^V4.0610^ea^ avitakkāvicāro ^a^T5.0367^ea^ nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā (pañca). savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu ca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā (cha). savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu ca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā (satta).

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (ekaṃ). avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (dve). avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkāvicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (tīṇi). avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā (cattāri). avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā (pañca).

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkāvicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (ekaṃ). avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (dve). avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (tīṇi). avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti ^a^T5.0368^ea^ hetupaccayā (cattāri). avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā (pañca). avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu ca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā (cha). avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu ca avitakkavicāramatto ^a^M4.0495^ea^ nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā (satta).

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuñca avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (ekaṃ). savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuñca avitakkāvicāraṃ ^a^V4.0611^ea^ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (dve). savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuñca avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkāvicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (tīṇi). savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuñca avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā (cattāri). savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuñca avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā (pañca). savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuñca avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu ca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti ^a^T5.0369^ea^ hetupaccayā (cha). savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuñca avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu ca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā (satta).

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuñca avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (ekaṃ). avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuñca avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (dve). avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuñca avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkāvicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (tīṇi). avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuñca avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā (cattāri). avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuñca avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā (pañca).

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicāraṃ ^a^M4.0496^ea^ nahetuñca avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (ekaṃ). savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuñca avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkāvicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (dve). savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuñca avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti ^a^T5.0370^ea^ hetupaccayā (tīṇi).

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicāraṃ ^a^V4.0612^ea^ nahetuñca avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuñca avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (ekaṃ). savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuñca avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuñca avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkāvicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (dve). savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuñca avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuñca avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā (tīṇi).

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu ca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā... cattāri.
[03] avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkāvicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā... pañca.
[03] savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuñca avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkāvicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuñca avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā... cattāri.
[03] savitakkasavicāraṃ ^a^T5.0371^ea^ ^a^M4.0497^ea^ ^a^V4.0613^ea^ nahetuñca avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā... ekaṃ.
[01] savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuñca avitakkavicāramattaṃ nahetuñca avitakkāvicāraṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā... ekaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ).

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ hetuyā sattatiṃsa, ārammaṇe ekavīsa, adhipatiyā tevīsa, anantare ekavīsa, sahajāte sattatiṃsa, aññamaññe aṭṭhavīsa, nissaye sattatiṃsa, upanissaye ekavīsa, purejāte ekādasa, āsevane ekādasa, kamme sattatiṃsa, vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge sattatiṃsa, sampayutte ekavīsa, vippayutte sattatiṃsa...pe0... avigate sattatiṃsa, (saṃkhittaṃ).
[01] nahetuyā tettiṃsa, nāarammaṇe satta (saṃkhittaṃ).
[01] hetupaccayā nāarammaṇe satta (saṃkhittaṃ).
[03] nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cuddasa (saṃkhittaṃ).
[03] (sahajātavārampi...pe0... sampayuttavārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo savitakkasavicārassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. savitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo avitakkavicāramattassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. savitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo avitakkāvicārassa ^a^V4.0614^ea^ nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. savitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo savitakkasavicārassa nahetussa ca avitakkavicāramattassa nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... cattāri ^a^T5.0372^ea^.

[03] 95^b^.^eb^ avitakkavicāramatto ^a^M4.0498^ea^ nahetu dhammo avitakkavicāramattassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. avitakkavicāramatto nahetu dhammo savitakkasavicārassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. avitakkavicāramatto nahetu dhammo avitakkāvicārassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. avitakkavicāramatto nahetu dhammo savitakkasavicārassa nahetussa ca avitakkavicāramattassa nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... cattāri.

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ avitakkāvicāro nahetu dhammo avitakkāvicārassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. avitakkāvicāro nahetu dhammo savitakkasavicārassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. avitakkāvicāro nahetu dhammo avitakkavicāramattassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. avitakkāvicāro nahetu dhammo avitakkavicāramattassa nahetussa ca avitakkāvicārassa nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. avitakkāvicāro nahetu dhammo savitakkasavicārassa nahetussa ca avitakkavicāramattassa nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... pañca.

[03] 97^b^.^eb^ avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā savitakkasavicārassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā avitakkavicāramattassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā avitakkāvicārassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā savitakkasavicārassa nahetussa ca avitakkavicāramattassa nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... cattāri.

[03] 98^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicāro nahetu ca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca dhammā savitakkasavicārassa ^a^V4.0615^ea^ nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. savitakkasavicāro nahetu ca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca dhammā avitakkavicāramattassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena ^a^T5.0373^ea^ paccayo. savitakkasavicāro ^a^M4.0499^ea^ nahetu ca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca dhammā avitakkāvicārassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. savitakkasavicāro nahetu ca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca dhammā savitakkasavicārassa nahetussa ca avitakkavicāramattassa nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... cattāri.
[03] 99^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo savitakkasavicārassa nahetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo... satta.
[03] avitakkavicāramatto nahetu dhammo avitakkavicāramattassa nahetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo... pañca.
[03] avitakkāvicāro nahetu dhammo avitakkāvicārassa nahetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo... pañca.
[03] avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca avitakkāvicāro nahetu ca dhammā savitakkasavicārassa nahetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] savitakkasavicāro nahetu ca avitakkavicāramatto nahetu ca dhammā savitakkasavicārassa nahetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] 100^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo savitakkasavicārassa nahetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo...pe0... samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
[03] savitakkasavicāro ^a^V4.0616^ea^ nahetu dhammo savitakkasavicārassa nahetussa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ).

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ ārammaṇe ekavīsa, adhipatiyā tevīsa, anantare pañcavīsa, samanantare pañcavīsa, sahajāte tiṃsa, aññamaññe aṭṭhavīsa, nissaye tiṃsa, upanissaye pañcavīsa, purejāte pañca, pacchājāte pañca, āsevane ekavīsa, kamme ekādasa, vipāke ekavīsa, āhāre ekādasa...pe0... avigate tiṃsa (saṃkhittaṃ).
[01] nahetuyā ^a^M4.0500^ea^ pañcatiṃsa, nāarammaṇe pañcatiṃsa, nādhipatiyā ^a^T5.0374^ea^ pañcatiṃsa (saṃkhittaṃ).
[01] ārammaṇapaccayā nahetuyā ekavīsa (saṃkhittaṃ).
[03] nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekavīsa (saṃkhittaṃ).
[03] (yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
[03] 102^b^.^eb^ pītisahagataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[01] sukhasahagataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] upekkhāsahagataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... ekaṃ.
[03] pītisahagataṃ ^a^V4.0617^ea^ hetuñca sukhasahagataṃ hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi (saṃkhittaṃ).
[03] 103^b^.^eb^ hetuyā dasa, ārammaṇe dasa...pe0... avigate dasa (saṃkhittaṃ).
[03] nādhipatiyā dasa, napurejāte dasa, napacchājāte dasa, nāasevane dasa, navipāke dasa, navippayutte dasa (saṃkhittaṃ).
[03] (sahajātavārampi...pe0... sampayuttavārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
[03] 104^b^.^eb^ pītisahagato hetu dhammo pītisahagatassa hetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[01] sukhasahagato ^a^M4.0501^ea^ hetu dhammo sukhasahagatassa hetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[01] upekkhāsahagato ^a^T5.0375^ea^ hetu dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa hetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo... ekaṃ.
[03] pītisahagato hetu ca sukhasahagato hetu ca dhammā pītisahagatassa hetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.

[03] 105^b^.^eb^ pītisahagato hetu dhammo pītisahagatassa hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. pītisahagato hetu dhammo sukhasahagatassa hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. pītisahagato hetu dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo ^a^V4.0618^ea^. pītisahagato hetu dhammo pītisahagatassa hetussa ca sukhasahagatassa hetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... cattāri.

[03] sukhasahagato hetu dhammo sukhasahagatassa hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. sukhasahagato hetu dhammo pītisahagatassa hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. sukhasahagato hetu dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. sukhasahagato hetu dhammo pītisahagatassa hetussa ca sukhasahagatassa hetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... cattāri.

[03] upekkhāsahagato hetu dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. upekkhāsahagato hetu dhammo pītisahagatassa hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. upekkhāsahagato hetu dhammo sukhasahagatassa hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. upekkhāsahagato hetu dhammo pītisahagatassa hetussa ca sukhasahagatassa hetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... cattāri.
[03] pītisahagato hetu ca sukhasahagato hetu ca dhammā pītisahagatassa hetussa ^a^T5.0376^ea^ dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... cattāri.
[03] pītisahagato ^a^M4.0502^ea^ hetu dhammo pītisahagatassa hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ hetuyā dasa, ārammaṇe soḷasa, adhipatiyā soḷasa, anantare soḷasa, samanantare soḷasa, sahajāte dasa, aññamaññe dasa, nissaye dasa, upanissaye soḷasa...pe0... vipāke dasa...pe0... avigate dasa (saṃkhittaṃ).
[01] nahetuyā soḷasa, nāarammaṇe soḷasa (saṃkhittaṃ).
[01] hetupaccayā nāarammaṇe dasa (saṃkhittaṃ).
[01] nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe soḷasa (saṃkhittaṃ).
[03] (yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ pītisahagataṃ ^a^V4.0619^ea^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. pītisahagataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. pītisahagataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato nahetu ca sukhasahagato nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)

[03] sukhasahagataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. sukhasahagataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. sukhasahagataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato nahetu ca sukhasahagato nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
[03] upekkhāsahagataṃ ^a^T5.0377^ea^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato nahetudhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)

[03] pītisahagataṃ nahetuñca sukhasahagataṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. pītisahagataṃ nahetuñca sukhasahagataṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato nahetu dhammo ^a^M4.0503^ea^ uppajjati hetupaccayā. pītisahagataṃ nahetuñca sukhasahagataṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato nahetu ca sukhasahagato nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
[03] 108^b^.^eb^ pītisahagataṃ ^a^V4.0620^ea^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato nahetu dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] sukhasahagataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato nahetu dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] upekkhāsahagataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato nahetu dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā... ekaṃ.
[03] pītisahagataṃ nahetuñca sukhasahagataṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato nahetu dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā... tīṇi (saṃkhittaṃ).
[03] 109^b^.^eb^ hetuyā dasa, ārammaṇe dasa, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare dasa...pe0... avigate dasa (saṃkhittaṃ).
[03] nahetuyā dasa, nādhipatiyā dasa (saṃkhittaṃ. sahajātavārampi...pe0... sampayuttavārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

[03] 110^b^.^eb^ pītisahagato nahetu dhammo pītisahagatassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. pītisahagato nahetu dhammo sukhasahagatassa ^a^T5.0378^ea^ nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. pītisahagato nahetu dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. pītisahagato nahetu dhammo pītisahagatassa nahetussa ca sukhasahagatassa nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (4)

[03] sukhasahagato nahetu dhammo sukhasahagatassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. sukhasahagato ^a^V4.0621^ea^ nahetu dhammo pītisahagatassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. sukhasahagato ^a^M4.0504^ea^ nahetu dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. sukhasahagato nahetu dhammo pītisahagatassa nahetussa ca sukhasahagatassa nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (4)

[03] upekkhāsahagato nahetu dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. upekkhāsahagato nahetu dhammo pītisahagatassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. upekkhāsahagato nahetu dhammo sukhasahagatassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. upekkhāsahagato nahetu dhammo pītisahagatassa nahetussa ca sukhasahagatassa nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (4)
